title: Lion in Art T-Shirt
description:
T-Shirt developed from Edward Kemeys’ Lion, 1893, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

The iconic lions you know and love, seen through the lens of prominent periods of art history: Greco-Roman, Impressionism, Cubism, Art Deco, and Pop Art.

  • Size: XS, S, M, L, XL
  • Material: 100% cotton
  • Shirt color: White
  • Care Instructions: Machine wash cold.
